{{Infobox Radio station | name = WAKT-FM | image = [[Image:HANK RADIO wiki.jpg]]| | city = [[Callaway, Florida]] | area = [[Panama City, Florida]] | branding = ''103.5 HANK FM'' | slogan = Plays Everything Country | airdate = | frequency = 103.5 [[MHz]] | format = [[Country music|Country]] | erp = 100,000 [[watt]]s | haat = 129 [[meter]]s | class = C1 | facility_id = 42371 | coordinates = {{coord|30|10|51.00|N|85|29|45.00|W|region:US_type:city}} | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = WXDZ (1989-1989)
WBKL (1989-1991)
WDRK (1991-1997)
WMXP (1997-2004) | affiliations = [[Premiere Radio Networks]], [[Westwood One]] | owner = Double O Radio Corporation | licensee = | sister_stations = | webcast = [http://player.streamtheworld.com/liveplayer.php?callsign=WAKTFM Listen Live]| | website = [http://www.1035hankfm.com/ 1035hankfm.com]| }} '''WAKT-FM''' (103.5 [[FM broadcasting|FM]]) is a [[radio station]] broadcasting a [[Country music]] format. Licensed to [[Callaway, Florida]], USA, the station serves the Panama City area. The station is currently owned by Double O Radio Corporation and features programing from [[Premiere Radio Networks]] and [[Westwood One]].{{cite web|url=http://www.fcc.gov/fcc-bin/fmq?call=WAKT-FM |title=WAKT-FM Facility Record |work=United States [[Federal Communications Commission]], audio division }} ==History== The station was assigned the call letters WXDZ on 1989-10-12. On 1989-12-05, the station changed its call sign to WBKL, on 1991-12-06 to WDRK, on 1997-11-21 to WMXP, and on 2004-03-10 to the current WAKT-FM.{{cite web |url=http://fjallfoss.fcc.gov/cgi-bin/ws.exe/prod/cdbs/pubacc/prod/call_hist.pl?Facility_id=42371&Callsign=WAKT |title=WAKT Call Sign History |work=United States [[Federal Communications Commission]], audio division}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{FM station data|WAKT}}
